p: Plant EOs has always a prominent role in various traditional medicinal systems and is in use for centuries. Currently, researchers are keen to unfold their potential biological and therapeutic effects along with their possible association in the modern medicine system ( Abouhosseini Tabari et al., 2018). Various compounds from different EOs have been identified as active biomolecules to affect conditions like anxiety, depression, and epilepsy due to their action upon the CNS ( Rakotosaona et al., 2017). Despite the potential use of EOs from piper species in neurological disorders, no previous scientific reports on the neuropharmacological effect of Piper nigrum EO.
